author: Daniel Greene
description:
This week in Fantasy News, we've got  Fallout 1 & 2's lost source code being recovered, to a new Gaelic translation of The Hobbit, Kindle being accused of censoring Stephen King. Oh, and Worldcon 2025? Would you believe they're in hot water?

Also in this episode:

SPFBO ends with an unexpected twist

Philip Pullman’s Book of Dust trilogy finally concludes

New covers for the Greenbone Saga and Chronicles of Narnia

Fallout dev heroics, Galaxy Grifter, The War of Lost Hearts, and more
